overview: A psychologist with unconventional methods challenges a psychiatric hospital and win the admiration and love of a doctor, but he pulls back due to finding that he has only a short time to live. He achieves mixed results with  his patients, but ultimately achieves a measure of love and recognition.
tagline: "One Flew over the Cuckoo's Nest" meets "Children of a Lesser God"
title: The Lunatics' Ball
